articles.title: Little F7: Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 Phone & 6500mAh Battery
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Little has launched the Little F7, a new high-performance smartphone featuring the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor and a 6,500mAh battery. The Little F7 includes a 6.83-inch screen, a 50MP Sony IMX882 main lens, and operates on the Hyperos 2 system and is available in Black, White, and Cyber Silver Edition, with storage options of 256GB (449.99 euros) and 512GB (499.99 euros).

articles.title: More than 4,000 towns to get ‘same day' and ‘next day' delivery under major Amazon shakeup
articles.author: Nicole Cherruault
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its delivery network to offer same-day and next-day delivery services to over 4,000 towns across the US. The company is investing over $4 billion to triple its delivery network capacity and regionalize its supply chain, leveraging AI to optimize inventory management. This expansion aims to improve delivery times and availability of essential items for Amazon Prime members and other customers.

articles.title: Christopher Sterlacci is Helping to Unlock Scalable Growth Through Digital Innovation
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Pyxel, under Christopher Sterlacci, launched 'Ignite X Brand,' offering branding and e-commerce solutions to help startups and lifestyle ventures establish themselves and scale rapidly. This includes logo creation, packaging, delivery systems, and marketing strategies, providing an all-in-one platform for new businesses to launch confidently.

articles.title: DeepMind AI for Robots: Local Processing Explained
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google DeepMind launched Gemini Robotics On-Device on June 24, a new robotics foundation model that empowers robots to operate locally without a constant data network. This model enhances robotic capabilities with features like general-purpose dexterity, fast task adaptation, and local operation, and is designed for bi-arm robots, enabling rapid adaptation to new tasks with minimal training.

articles.title: 28 Reliable Products Every Savvy Thirtysomething Will Want To Own
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced a new product called the "Sqeezy" set, which includes their legendary cleaning paste and a versatile cleaning sponge. The new Sqeezy product helps in removing grease and mildew.

articles.title: ✨ Give your storefront a glow-up
articles.summary: Ford & Sims Pressure Washing specializes in cleaning awnings and glass windows for storefronts. They offer tailored services for quick refreshes or deep cleans. They are offering a free estimate for this service.

articles.title: Roborock expands its presence into the stick vacuum cleaner category with H60 Series & H60 Hub Series announcement  Jun. 24, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Roborock has launched its new H60 and H60 Hub Series of stick vacuum cleaners, expanding its product portfolio. The H60 Hub Series introduces an auto-empty dock, while the H60 series features a bendable wand for hard-to-reach areas. The Roborock H60 Series & H0 Hub Series has already launched in some countries and will be available worldwide in several major markets.

articles.title: Toyota LandCruiser Prado van revealed
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Toyota introduced the new LandCruiser Commercial, which is based on the Prado but reconfigured as a van.

articles.title: Toyota UK converts LandCruiser Prado into a van
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Toyota is launching the new LandCruiser Commercial, which is presented as a van based on the Prado model.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney Bathwater company exposes ‘FAKE' soap listings on Walmart site after original sold out in minutes
articles.author: Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch launched a limited-edition soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss' on June 6, priced at $8. The soap was advertised as 'radiant, playful and tempting' and made with shea butter, pine bark extract, exfoliating sand, and drops of Sydney Sweeney's bathwater. Dr. Squatch launched 5,000 bars of the soap on its website, with the bars being marked as "out of stock" within just minutes.

articles.title: A grocery store staple is getting a makeover
articles.author: Silicon Valley.com
articles.summary: King's Hawaiian is launching redesigned packaging for its sweet buns and rolls in July. The company describes this as an evolution and modernization of its brand expression rather than a drastic change.

articles.title: Next Xbox From Microsoft Has AMD Inside and Breaks Free From Store Limits
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Microsoft is evolving its Xbox service to be platform-agnostic. The next-gen Xbox will allow access to services such as Steam and the Epic Games Store, breaking away from traditional console restrictions. This evolution positions the new Xbox as a versatile and user-friendly system for gamers.

articles.title: Occams Digital Launches to Solve the Marketing Scalability Crisis
articles.author: Occams Advisory
articles.summary: Occams Digital, a division of Occams Advisory, has launched a subscription-based service that provides marketing teams with access to full-stack creative and digital execution. The service offers creative production, strategic support, and operational tools through a Business App, for a flat monthly rate. Occams Digital aims to provide on-demand marketing scale and specialisation to solve marketing scalability issues.

articles.title: Google launches AI Mode for Search in India
articles.summary: Google has introduced its AI-powered search feature in India, expanding its availability to a wider audience. This new mode utilizes a custom version of Gemini 2.5, offering in-depth reasoning, multimodality, and the ability to handle complex questions through voice or photo inputs.

articles.title: No Name brand in spotlight after concept of generic store goes viral
articles.summary: Loblaw, a Canadian grocery giant, piloted brick-and-mortar 'No Name' brand stores in three Ontario cities. These stores are standalone locations for the company's generic brand, which already includes a line of grocery items and merchandise.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new foldables at Brooklyn event
articles.author: Brooklyn Eagle Staff
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host its Unpacked summer event on July 9 in Brooklyn. At the event, Samsung will unveil a new slate of foldable and AI-enhanced smartphones and other devices which will be live-streamed globally. The showcase promises the 'next evolution' of Samsung's Galaxy product line.

articles.title: Lord Sugar says grandson, 22, doesn't get 'any handouts'
articles.author: Ellis Whitehouse
articles.summary: Amstrad Digital, a digital marketing company led by Lord Alan Sugar's grandson, was launched and has generated a turnover of £600,000 within a year. The firm offers digital marketing services, emphasizing value for money and solid service, and it counts the latest winner of The Apprentice among its clientele. Lord Sugar bought back rights to the Amstrad brand and launched Amstrad Digital with his grandson.

articles.title: Verizon, America's Most Reliable 5G Network, Launches Industry-Leading, AI Powered Customer Experience Innovations  Jun. 24, 2025 18:30
articles.summary: Verizon is launching a new customer experience transformation that includes new AI-powered features like a new My Verizon app with Verizon Assistant and Savings Boost. The company is also introducing 24/7 live chat support and Customer Champions, which offers dedicated experts leveraging Google Cloud's AI for complex issues. This launch aims to provide more personalized and efficient customer support.

articles.title: TCL CSOT Awarded World's First SGS Certification for Quasi-Natural Light Spectrum Displays  Jun. 24, 2025 18:23
articles.summary: TCL CSOT's Natural-Spectrum Slim Pad Display has been launched and awarded the world's first SGS Quasi-Natural Light Spectrum EX certification. This new display technology optimizes the light spectrum to resemble natural sunlight, aiming to reduce eye strain and improve sleep quality, and it achieved a 56% QNLI score, surpassing the threshold required for EX-grade.

articles.title: Samsung Reveals Free Offer For Galaxy Z Fold 7 And Z Flip 7 Buyers
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new Galaxy devices, including fold and flip phones, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9 in Brooklyn, New York. The company is offering $50 of Samsung Credit for those who reserve by filling out a form, and if they proceed to purchase, they will receive the credit for use in the Samsung store. The event may also feature new Galaxy Watch models and earbuds.

articles.title: 26 Things You Need For Your Next Beach Vacation
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: The article presents several new products and updates relevant to beachgoers. The newest edition of the Kindle Paperwhite is introduced with waterproof and glare-free features and increased storage. Additionally, Sun Bum launches an SPF 30 sunscreen mist, and Sol De Janeiro offers the Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for skin rehydration.

articles.title: Galaxy Foldable Preorder: $1000 Off!
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch new products in July 2025, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Watch Ultra, new Galaxy Buds, and a Galaxy Ring. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 are expected to have design and performance upgrades, with improvements in display, camera, and portability. Samsung is offering pre-order reservations with store credit and potential trade-in savings.

articles.title: You Can Now Save Products on the Strategist (to Shop Later)
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: New York Magazine has introduced a 'product-save tool' on the Strategist website, indicated by heart icons on product images. This new service allows users to save products to a 'Saved for Later' tab in their account and track price updates for potential sales.

articles.title: Samsung's offering a $50 credit if you commit to preordering its upcoming Galaxy foldable
articles.author: Brandt Ranj
articles.summary: Samsung is holding an Unpacked event on July 9th to unveil new foldable phones, hinted by the 'Ultra Unfolds' tagline. By reserving the upcoming device, customers can receive a $50 credit to the Samsung store upon pre-order and purchase. The event is expected to showcase a thin foldable smartphone with Ultra branding and potentially address camera concerns from previous models like the Galaxy Z Fold 6, possibly launching Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7.

articles.title: Des Moines Arts Festival happening this weekend
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires the WeAreIowa app for phone streaming. The WeAreIowa app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content.

articles.title: Samsung poised to unveil latest folding smartphones on July 9
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. plans to introduce new foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7, at its launch event on July 9. The company is also expected to announce the Galaxy Watch 8 and highlight its Galaxy AI suite of software features. The Fold 7 is expected to have a thinner design and slimmer bezels.

articles.title: Highly-Rated Steam Cleaners From Amazon
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: The article features several steam cleaners for home use, including the Steamify handheld steamer, Shark's Steam & Scrub mop, McCulloch's deluxe canister steam cleaner, and Waitbird steamer. These products vary in size, features (like rotating pads, multiple accessories, and adjustable steam levels), and intended use (from small areas to whole-house cleaning), offering a range of options for consumers.

articles.title: Why SSGs Work Great For SEO And Speed
articles.summary: Flashyminds, a web development company, builds websites using Static Site Generators (SSGs) to improve website speed and SEO. Flashyminds utilizes SSGs for e-commerce platforms and takes a mobile-first approach, ensuring sites load quickly and perform well on all devices. They also integrate static tools with other platforms to maintain site speed and ease of use.

articles.title: Lawson Opens "Future" Convenience Store in Tokyo
articles.summary: Lawson Inc. has opened a "future" convenience store in Tokyo, featuring digital technology provided by KDDI Corp. The store operates under the joint ownership of KDDI and Mitsubishi Corp.

articles.title: Why Every Creator Needs This High-Capacity Portable Storage Device
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: SanDisk has launched the 8TB SanDisk Extreme Portable SSD, a durable, high-capacity storage solution designed for content creators and professionals. The SSD features fast data-transfer speeds, password protection with 256-bit AES hardware encryption, and water and dust resistance.

articles.title: This Compatible MagSafe SSD Turns Your Smartphone Into a Content Creation Machine
articles.author: Sponsored
articles.summary: SanDisk launched the Creator Phone SSD, a MagSafe-compatible external storage solution tailored for mobile content creators, unveiled at CES 2025 as part of the Creator Series. This SSD allows iPhone users to record ProRes videos up to 4K at 60 fps and offers 1TB and 2TB capacities, addressing storage limitations when shooting high-resolution content on smartphones. It is IP65 dust and water resistant and comes with a one-month Adobe Creative Cloud subscription.

articles.title: Samsung set to launch Galaxy Z Flip 7, Fold 7 & Fold Ultra at July 9 event in New York
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Samsung will hold a launch event on July 9 in Brooklyn, New York, to unveil new products, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Z Fold 7, and possibly the Galaxy Z Fold Ultra foldable smartphones. The event may also feature updates on Project Moohan, Samsung's mixed-reality headset, and a new wearable device.

articles.title: Arby's debuts new sandwich, but it won't stick around. Here's what to know
articles.author: Tanasia Kenney
articles.summary: Arby's launched a new limited-time offering, the Angus Cheesesteak, on June 23rd. The cheesesteak features thin-sliced Angus steak, white American cheese, roasted onions and peppers, and a garlic spread on a toasted roll and is available in-store and online.

articles.title: Samsung announces release dates for Galaxy Z Fold and Flip
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, featuring slimmer designs and advanced AI integration. The company also plans to introduce the Galaxy Watch 8 series and the Galaxy Watch Ultra 2025 with rugged designs and health tracking, and debut One UI 8 powered by Android 16, which will introduce AI-driven features.

articles.title: ChatGPT Crushed The First-Mover Myth For Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Dileep Rao
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT experienced explosive growth, reaching $10 billion in annual recurring revenue by June 2025. OpenAI wasn't the first to launch an AI chatbot; the company strategically launched its entry, improving on existing technology. This approach allowed them to leapfrog early movers and redefine the category of AI chatbots.

articles.title: Nerve Fresh 2025: Exploring the Science and Safety Behind a Popular Natural Nerve Support Supplement
articles.author: Nerve Fresh
articles.summary: Nerve Fresh has launched a new natural supplement in 2025 that supports nerve function and eases discomfort with plant-based ingredients. The supplement, designed to address nerve-related concerns, is available for purchase on the official website and is gaining traction in wellness circles and the aging population for its focus on safety, transparency, and long-term wellness.

articles.title: Best Ninja deals to expect for Amazon Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: Ninja products, including the Ninja Creami Deluxe and Ninja Zerostick Ceramic Pro 5-Piece Pan Set, are expected to have discounts during Amazon Prime Day 2025. The Ninja Crispi air fryer, a recent innovation with glass bowls, is also on sale, offering a 31% discount. The Ninja Foodi 9-in-1 Multi Cooker is currently at its lowest price ever on Amazon.

articles.title: Panda Hub Expands Car Detailing Marketplace Across the United States and Canada
articles.summary: Panda Hub, a mobile car detailing marketplace, has expanded its services into 15 U.S. states and 2 Canadian provinces. The platform connects vehicle owners with certified detailers for on-site interior and exterior services, offering professional car care at the customer's location. The company supports a network of over 1,000 professionals and emphasizes eco-conscious cleaning practices.

articles.title: Telecom newcomer Lebara rolls out 0724 number series
articles.author: Olayide Soaga
articles.summary: Lebara Nigeria has secured full interconnectivity with major Mobile Network Operators in Nigeria and is rolling out its 0724 number series, signifying its operational readiness for launch. As a Tier 5 Mobile Virtual Network Operator (MVNO), Lebara Nigeria intends to leverage international experience to introduce reliable and affordable mobile communication solutions to Nigerian consumers.

articles.title: Ali Lokhandwala transforming Amazon sellers into successful entrepreneurs
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Ali Lokhandwala offers a mentoring program designed to help individuals launch and scale their Amazon businesses. The program includes personalized guidance, expert assistance, winning product identification, supplier partnerships and access to training courses. Ali's focus is on creating successful online entrepreneurs in India's growing e-commerce market.

articles.title: Next's new £70 linen dress that looks 'cool and effortlessly elegant' for holidays
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has launched a new Linen Midi Column Dress, priced at £70. The dress is available in neutral and blue colors, ranging in sizes from six to 26, and features pockets, a zip fastening, and is machine washable as part of Next's N. Premium range.

articles.title: Poco F7 Review: Most Powerful Mid-range Smartphone In India?
articles.author: Deep Majumdar
articles.summary: Poco has launched the Poco F7, a mid-range smartphone with flagship-tier features, including a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor, a 6.83-inch 120Hz OLED display, and a 50MP Sony camera. It is priced at Rs 29,999 for the 12GB + 256GB variant and Rs 31,999 for the 12GB + 512GB variant and offers four years of software updates and six years of security updates.

articles.title: Verizon launches what it calls its "most significant customer experience transformation
articles.summary: Verizon is introducing a significant customer experience transformation. This includes a new app and a major upgrade to their existing customer support system.

articles.title: Poco F7: AI Camera & New Design Revealed
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Xiaomi's sub-brand, Poco, has launched the Poco F7, a mid-range smartphone featuring a 50 MP main camera with a Sony IMX882 sensor and powered by a Snapdragon 8 gene 3 processor. The Poco F7 is available with 12 GB RAM and either 256 GB or 512 GB storage, priced at €449.90 and €499.90, respectively.

articles.title: Bluetooth Speaker & Vibrator: The Groove Thing Review
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The 'Groove Thing' is a new versatile device that combines a portable Bluetooth speaker with a hidden vibrator. It utilizes Bluetooth for easy pairing with smartphones and offers various vibration modes and intensity levels. The design aims for discretion, mimicking a common item, with materials that are skin-friendly and easy to clean.

articles.title: Generative AI Services Market to Hit USD 43.8 Billion by 2030, Fueled by SaaS & Healthcare Demand
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The Generative AI Services market is experiencing significant growth, fueled by increasing demand across industries and advancements in cloud platforms. Integration of Generative AI with SaaS platforms allows enterprises to access AI tools easily. Cloud providers like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud offer specialized hardware for generative AI workloads, enabling businesses to experiment and deploy AI services.

articles.title: How AI Agents Can Take Your Business Analytics To Another Level
articles.author: Alon Goren
articles.summary: AnswerRocket's AI agents can proactively alert business users to changing consumer preferences and recommend new product explorations. For instance, AI could highlight emerging trends, such as rising interest in non-alcoholic spirits, recommending that the company explore opportunities in this growing market segment within the upcoming year. This empowers companies to consider pivoting away early from the declining category before sales tank or think about launching a new product to get ahead of their competitors.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's swing picture is genius in ways you don't realise
articles.author: Vanessa Feltz
articles.summary: Meghan Markle has released a new photo to coincide with the re-release of her As Ever jam and flower petal sprinkles. Additionally, she is launching her signature Napa Valley rosé wine.

articles.title: Stanley's new insulated lunch boxes are the ideal summer sidekick — here's when you can get them
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Stanley is launching a new Summer Edit on June 24, featuring All Day Lunch Boxes in two sizes and various colors, priced at $45 and $60 respectively. The release also includes new 40 oz and 30 oz Quencher Tumblers, along with leakproof Quencher ProTour Tumblers, available in different colors and priced between $35 and $45.

articles.title: St. Louis Blues unveil new jerseys, redesigned Blue Note and new secondary logos
articles.summary: The St. Louis Blues are unveiling new jerseys, changes to its Blue Note logo, and newly created secondary logos for the upcoming season. These changes introduce a new look for the team.

articles.title: WhatsitAI Surpasses 50K Users Identifying, Valuing & Listing items for Sale
articles.author: Whatsit AI Inc
articles.summary: WhatsitAI, an AI-powered mobile app for identifying and valuing secondhand items, has surpassed 50,000 downloads since its launch a few months ago. The app allows users to snap a photo of an item and receive real-time pricing estimates and marketplace listings by aggregating and analyzing data from major resale marketplaces. The base version of WhatsitAI is free, with more features available with subscription.

articles.title: Verizon's AI-Powered Overhaul Of Customer Support Draws Retail Praise
articles.author: Stocktwits Inc
articles.summary: Verizon is launching a major overhaul of its customer service model, introducing a suite of new AI-powered tools and features to deliver a more personalized experience for its wireless and broadband customers. This includes AI tools from Alphabet Inc., enhanced support options through the My Verizon app (Verizon Assistant and Savings Boost), 24/7 live chat, and dedicated Customer Champions.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Flip 7: Price Hike Expected?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, next-generation foldable devices, at an Unpacked event on July 9, 2025. These phones will debut with One UI 8. Reservations are currently being accepted.

articles.title: Samsung's big foldable reveal slated for July 9 in NYC : Here's what to expect
articles.author: Dhruv Mohan
articles.summary: Samsung will host its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, where it will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and potentially a Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra. The event will also likely introduce updates to the smartwatch lineup, including the Galaxy Watch 8, Watch 8 Classic, and a new Galaxy Watch Ultra.

articles.title: Get ready: Nintendo Switch 2 launches exclusively on Nintendo Official Store on Shopee this June 26
articles.author: The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 Console exclusively on Shopee on June 26. The official launch price at Nintendo's Official Shopee Store is ₱31,990.

articles.title: WellSaid Expands AI Voice Offering with Lowest-Cost API and Revenue-Ready Partner Program
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WellSaid launched an upgraded developer API, which features premium-quality AI voice with full programmatic control and reduced pricing.  Along with the new API, WellSaid introduced the WellSaid Partner Program which provides additional support and technical advancement for customers to help enterprise organizations integrate WellSaid's API into their products.

articles.title: WellSaid Expands AI Voice Offering with Lowest-Cost API and Revenue-Ready Partner Program
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: WellSaid launched a major upgrade to its developer API, which combines premium-quality AI voice with unmatched control and the lowest pricing among AI Voice providers. This allows product and engineering teams to build ultra-realistic voice experiences faster, with full programmatic control and costs reduced by up to 50%. The WellSaid Partner Program also provides a path for API customers to monetize voice.

articles.title: Amazon Expands Prime Delivery Services Across Rural U.S.
articles.author: Adriano Marchese
articles.summary: Amazon is extending its Same-Day and Next-Day Delivery service to more than 4,000 smaller cities and rural communities across the U.S. This expansion, backed by a $4 billion investment, aims to reach millions of online shoppers by the end of the year, offering a wider selection of everyday essentials, groceries, and household goods.

articles.title: 34 Products To Beat Procrastination For Good
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Revlon introduced a hot air brush. The hot air brush can dry, style, straighten, and add volume. HexClad introduced a wok, it's scratch resistant, dishwasher safe, and nonstick.

articles.title: Nectar's 4th of July mattress sale s already live! Save up to 50% now
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Nectar launched its 4th of July mattress sale, offering up to 50% discounts on memory foam and hybrid mattresses. Customers can also get a bedding bundle valued at $599 for $179 with a mattress purchase.

articles.title: Samsung Ultra Experience: See the Future Now!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung's 'Ultra Experience' is evolving to encompass integrated experiences, seamless connectivity, and personalized user interfaces. Future innovations include advancements in display technology like MicroLED, enhanced camera capabilities through AI and sensor technology, and integration with augmented and mixed reality applications. The goal is to create a more intuitive and intelligent interaction with the digital world through Samsung devices.

articles.title: Doogee Blade GT Play Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Doogee announced the Blade GT Pro smartphone in June 2025, featuring a 5800 mAh battery with 18W wired charging and is available in Black and Silver colors. The smartphone is powered by a Mediatek Dimensity 7025 (6 nm) Octa-core processor coupled with IMG BXM-8-256 graphics processing unit (GPU). The rear camera includes a 100-megapixel (wide) + 8-megapixel (ultrawide) + 2-megapixel (macro) setup, and the front camera is 32-megapixel (wide).

articles.title: AI Is Transforming Retail. Here's How Small Businesses Can Benefit.
articles.author: Catherine Erdly
articles.summary: Shopify is experimenting with declarative commerce, allowing business owners to express what they want to achieve and letting the technology handle the execution.  This shift is behind Shopify's new Horizon theme, where users can describe their vision, and AI creates the design. The new approach responds to business goals, not just manual tasks.

articles.title: The Expo Group Redefines Trade Show Exhibitor Experience with Brand New ExpoPortal
articles.author: The Expo Group
articles.summary: The Expo Group launched ExpoPortal, a reimagined online system for exhibitors. This new system introduces game-changing capabilities designed to eliminate hurdles and headaches for modern exhibitors, building upon their previous CyberServices system.

articles.title: No More Lost Suction: Tineco's PURE ONE Station 5 Tackles the Hidden Flaws of Traditional Stick Vacuums
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco is launching the PURE ONE Station 5, a smart stick vacuum designed for long-term performance and hygiene, featuring a Full-Path Self-Cleaning System. The 3-in-1 Smart Station charges, stores, and deep cleans the vacuum automatically. This new product will be available on Amazon and Tineco.com during Prime Day with special promotional pricing.

articles.title: Amaze Launches Express Checkout and Expanded Payment Options to Enhance User Experience
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings Inc. has launched Express Checkout and expanded alternative payment methods, including Apple Pay, Google Pay, Affirm, and Klarna, to streamline online purchases for U.S. customers. These enhancements aim to reduce checkout friction and increase sales for creators using Amaze digital storefronts. The new features are live on all Amaze digital storefronts for U.S. customers.

articles.title: Amaze Launches Express Checkout and Expanded Payment Options to Enhance User Experience
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings Inc. is rolling out Express Checkout and a broader range of alternative payment methods to streamline the online purchasing experience for U.S. customers. This update aims to improve speed, flexibility, and convenience across Amaze storefronts.

articles.title: POCO introduces the POCO F7: Where futuristic design meets exceptional power
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: POCO has launched the POCO F7 smartphone, featuring the Snapdragon®️ 8s Gen 4 Mobile Platform and a 6.83-inch 1.5K ultra-bright display. It includes a 50MP Sony IMX882 main camera with OIS and a 6500mAh battery with 90W HyperCharge and will be available as a Shopee exclusive in three colors: Black, White, Silver, and in two variants at a special price from June 24 – 30.

articles.title: ONYX Invites You to BECOME HERO
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ONYX has launched a new product line called HERO, designed for janitorial custodians. The initial products include the HERO T1 Low Speed Floor Machine, available in various sizes and with optional accessories, and the HERO R25 Wet-Dry Vacuum, featuring a 25-gallon capacity and front-mount squeegee. These products are available through authorized distribution partners and are supported by a "BECOME HERO Day" event.

articles.title: ONYX Invites You to BECOME HERO
articles.author: Onyx
articles.summary: ONYX launched a new product line named HERO. The HERO product line is centered around janitorial equipment and is designed for janitorial custodians.

articles.title: Samsung confirms next major Galaxy announcement and foldable is 'worth the wait'
articles.author: Fionnuala Boyle
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its new Galaxy Z series at the 'Unpacked' event on July 9 in New York. The new series will include the 'Galaxy Fold Ultra' which is expected to be thinner and easier to handle, and a new Z Flip with a larger cover display. All the new phones will be powered by Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.

articles.title: How AI Copywriting Is Changing Marketing: From Bots to Brilliant Ads
articles.author: Stephanie Maris
articles.summary: HumanizeAI.pro is a service that refines AI-generated text to make it more relatable and authentic, transforming robotic-sounding copy into warm, natural language for improved customer engagement. AI copywriting tools, like ai to human text converter, can assist businesses in generating marketing material faster and more effectively, offering features such as writing social media captions, creating advertising for Facebook and Google, and generating headlines.

articles.title: From Zero to Traffic Hero: Using Cheap Push Ads to Build Your Brand in Brazil
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: The article highlights push ads as an affordable method to drive traffic, especially effective in mobile-heavy markets like Brazil. A Brazilian startup named 'Casa Verde' successfully utilized push ads targeted at eco-conscious shoppers in São Paulo and boosted sales by 30%.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Foldable Release Date
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is scheduled to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold7, along with potential new Galaxy Z Flip additions, at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is expected to feature a thinner and lighter design, improved camera technology and software optimizations. This launch signifies Samsung's continued innovation in the foldable phone market, projected to reach 50 million units by 2027.

articles.title: Buy Vapes Online Australia – Discover Premium Options at Vape Hub Sydney
articles.summary: Vape Hub Sydney offers a wide selection of premium disposable vapes and vaping accessories online in Australia. They provide excellent customer service, competitive prices, and fast delivery across the country, ensuring a satisfying and hassle-free shopping experience for both beginners and experienced vapers.

articles.title: How To Create Memorable Product Placement Moments
articles.author: Alison Bringé
articles.summary: The article highlights how brands like Jacquesmus, Vestiaire Collective, and Baccarat are leveraging product placement in series like "Emily in Paris" to boost brand visibility and drive sales.  Specifically, Baccarat partnered with the show on a limited-edition crystal piece, directly available for viewers, which resulted in $429,000 in media impact value. Efficient sample management is highlighted as a critical process enabling brands to capitalize on these product placement opportunities effectively.

articles.title: Amazon Is Selling a Cold Plunge Tub for 46% Off, and Shoppers Say It's 'a Game Changer for My Recovery Routine'
articles.author: Daniel Donabedian
articles.summary: Tomaje introduced the XL Ice Bath Tub. Users unfold the tub, fill it with cold water and ice, and use it.

articles.title: Next £72 wrap dress is 'lovely and lightweight' and shoppers say 'great with heels'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Next is selling the Navy/Yellow One Shoulder Wrap Maxi Dress for £72. The dress features a one-shoulder design with tie detailing, a cinched waist, and is crafted from cotton and linen in a maxi length with sun and palm tree graphics.

articles.title: Doogee Blade GT Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Doogee announced the Blade GT Pro smartphone in June 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a 5800 mAh battery with 18W charging, a 6.72-inch display, Mediatek Dimensity 7025 processor, 12GB RAM, 512GB storage, a 100MP main camera, and a 32MP front camera. It runs on Android 14 and is available in Black and Silver.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Unpacked Announcement Confirms Brand New Incoming Phone
articles.author: Aasil Ahmed
articles.summary: Samsung has confirmed its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, 2025, in Brooklyn, New York, where it is expected to announce the next generation of Z foldables, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Z Fold 7, and potentially the Z Fold Ultra. The event will also showcase next-generation Galaxy devices with a new AI-powered interface.

articles.title: Android could finally get iPhone-like Handoff features
articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.summary: Google is developing a "Handoff" feature for Android, similar to Apple's, to enable cross-device integration, allowing users to seamlessly continue tasks and access apps, media, and notifications across their devices.  The development also includes potentially streaming apps from a connected device with an "App Cast" feature.

articles.title: 40 Budget-Friendly Gifts They'll Actually Love
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The Summer Fridays brand has introduced a lip butter balm and a corresponding keychain cap holder. Sol de Janeiro launched Cheirosa 59 Hair & Body Perfume Mist, while Dossier offers Ambery Vanilla perfume. Oxo released a compact Brew Rapid Brewer for convenient cold or hot coffee brewing.

articles.title: How AI infiltrated perfume
articles.author: Arabelle Sicardi
articles.summary: Osmo, a fragrance tech startup, is offering a new service: AI-powered custom fragrance creation with a 48-hour sample turnaround. This system aims to disrupt the traditional fragrance market by digitizing scent creation and speeding up the formulation process. Osmo champions the work of its head perfumer, Christophe Laudamiel, but declined to provide names of any other perfumers within its ecosystem.

articles.title: W.C. BRADLEY CO. UNVEILS AI-POWERED CARE CENTER TO ENHANCE CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE AND INSIGHTS
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: W.C. Bradley Co., parent company of Charbroil, Oklahoma Joe's, and Pit Boss, launched an AI-powered platform within its Customer Care Center on June 11, 2025. The new system, built with NiCE, analyzes customer interactions to streamline issue resolution and reduce handling time. This initiative aims to improve customer service and provide better insights for the organization.

articles.title: Fine Choice Foods Taps Into Spicy Trend With Launch of New Asian-inspired Products
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Fine Choice Foods launched two new premium products under its SUMM! brand: Pork Gyoza Dumplings with Chili Crisp Oil and Spicy Sriracha Chicken Spring Rolls. These additions cater to the growing consumer demand for bold, globally inspired flavors in the refrigerated deli space, aligning with market trends showing growth in the spicy and globally inspired refrigerated deli category.

articles.title: Verizon, America's Most Reliable 5G Network, Launches Industry-Leading, AI Powered Customer ...
articles.author: Verizon Communications
articles.summary: Verizon announced a significant customer experience transformation designed to empower customers with easier, more personalized support. This evolution introduces immediate and ongoing enhancements across customer care, digital services, and retail. The initiative is built on Verizon's 5G network and aims to improve customer loyalty and retention.

articles.title: Verizon, America's Most Reliable 5G Network, Launches Industry-Leading, AI Powered Customer Experience Innovations
articles.author: Verizon Communications
articles.summary: Verizon has launched a customer experience transformation, featuring a new AI-powered My Verizon app that maximizes efficiency and value. This includes a new AI assistant, Savings Boost, 24/7 live support and personalized customer service using Google Cloud's AI. Verizon is also offering free prizes via Verizon Access.

articles.title: Samsung to Unveil AI-Powered Galaxy Z Series in New York
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the latest Galaxy Z series smartphones, including Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, at the next 'Galaxy Unpacked' event in New York. These new smartphones will feature advanced AI and an ultra-slim foldable design. The devices are reimagined around a new AI-powered interface.

articles.title: TCL CSOT Awarded World's First SGS Certification for Quasi-Natural Light Spectrum Displays
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: TCL CSOT's Natural-Spectrum Slim Pad Display was awarded the world's first SGS Quasi-Natural Light Spectrum EX certification. The Natural-Spectrum Slim Pad Display achieved a QNLI score of 56%, surpassing the threshold required for EX-grade. TCL CSOT has introduced Quasi-Natural Light Spectrum Display Technology by optimizing both BLU and RGB color filter solutions.

articles.title: Launch Debuts AI Platform That Builds Production-Ready Apps in Minutes
articles.author: Bhumika Lenka
articles.summary: Launch, an AI-native platform, has officially launched, enabling users to generate production-ready applications from plain English prompts. The platform offers features like integrated databases, user authentication, payment processing, one-click deployment, and seamless GitHub integration, reducing development time and costs significantly. Launch is available with a free tier and paid plans offering advanced functionalities.

articles.title: Zig when they zag: Why fmcg brands should break the rules
articles.author: Paul Mcentee
articles.summary: Lucky Saint, an alcohol-free beer brand, distinguished itself by using religious iconography instead of the typical wellness narrative. Oddbox, a fruit & veg delivery service, launched 'Soilmates', a parody dating app for leftover vegetables to combat food waste. Hoka, a running brand, opened a community-focused convenience shop to display its range, focusing on community over elite athletes.

articles.title: This free read-it-later app is the perfect replacement for Pocket
articles.author: Chris Hoffman
articles.summary: Raindrop.io has launched an all-in-one bookmark manager with a modern interface, designed as an upgrade to the traditional bookmark experience and a replacement for Pocket. The service offers a free version with unlimited bookmarks, collections, and devices, along with a $3-per-month Pro plan that adds extra features like full-text search and permanent archiving.

articles.title: Just circle it: vivo Y29 lets you search smarter, not harder
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: vivo has launched the Y29 smartphone featuring 'Circle to Search with Google' and several AI-powered tools like AI Superlink, AI Translate, and AI Erase. The Y29, priced at P8,999, is available at vivo concept stores, kiosks, and the online e-store.

articles.title: Xbox aggregated game library coming to PC with hints of Steam support
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching a new aggregated library feature on the Xbox PC app, which will allow users to access games from Xbox, Game Pass, Battle.net, Steam, Epic Games Store and other PC storefronts from a single launcher. The feature is currently available to Xbox Insiders on Windows 11 PCs and will be released to the public later this year.

articles.title: How AI is personalizing your lifestyle: From Spotify to Nykaa
articles.author: NE NOW NEWS
articles.summary: Spotify utilizes AI algorithms to personalize music playlists based on user listening history. Nykaa employs AI skin analyzers to recommend suitable skincare routines. L'Oréal, Sephora, and Nykaa offer virtual makeup try-ons powered by AI.

articles.title: Lawson, KDDI launch ‘future convenience store' in Tokyo
articles.summary: Lawson Inc. and KDDI Corp. have opened a 'RealxTech Lawson' concept store in Tokyo featuring AI-powered signs for personalized advertisements and security, robotic fryers for cooking, and interactive screens providing remote assistance for telecommunications services and pharmaceutical consultations. This collaboration aims to create a high-tech convenience store experience and address labor shortages.

articles.title: Samsung confirms exact date next month your Galaxy phone will look outdated
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung will launch its next batch of foldable Galaxy phones, the Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6, at an 'Unpacked' event on July 9th at 3pm UK time in Brooklyn, New York. The event will be broadcast live on Samsung's YouTube channel.

articles.title: Simplify Connection: Quickly Make Connections with a QR Code Generator for Free
articles.summary: Adobe Express provides a QR code generator that allows users to create custom QR codes. The service is free, offers professional quality output, and allows for customizable designs. It enables businesses and individuals to efficiently share information and connect with their audience.

articles.title: AI+ Pulse, Nova 5G India Launch Confirmed: Check Specifications, Features, and Price Details
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: AI+ has announced the launch of two new smartphones, the AI+ Nova 5G and AI+ Pulse, in India, exclusively on Flipkart, in July. The AI+ Nova 5G features AI-backed photography and is promoted for its smooth functionality and next-gen connectivity, while the AI+ Pulse caters to users needing a dependable phone for everyday use.

articles.title: Verizon announcing AI-powered "customer experience transformation"
articles.author: Aman Kidwai
articles.summary: Verizon is launching a new suite of customer service experiences, including a Customer Champion and AI assistant. These enhancements, accessible via an app, text, or phone, aim to handle complex issues and provide updates. The My Verizon app will also include AI-powered savings and assistant support for billing and account management.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy Z smartphones at Unpacked event in New York next month
articles.author: 김보람
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 smartphones at its Unpacked event in New York on July 9. The new smartphones will feature advanced AI and an ultra-slim foldable design, including larger screens, enhanced cameras, and upgraded AI features.

articles.title: 'This robot vacuum cleaner with £200 off picked up more dirt than my Dyson'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: The article reviews the eufy Omni C20 robot vacuum cleaner, highlighting its improved WiFi connectivity, user-friendly app, and efficient mapping capabilities compared to the Laresar Clean Robot Vacuum Cleaner. The eufy Omni C20 automatically detects different floor types and adjusts mopping accordingly, and the author found that the eufy picks up dirt missed by regular vacuuming.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked Event In July Confirmed: Galaxy Z Fold 7 And More Expected
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung has confirmed the Galaxy Unpacked event for July 9, 2025, in New York, where they will launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which appears thinner than previous models.  The event may also include the announcement of the Galaxy Watch 8 series and Galaxy Buds 4. Samsung will also be highlighting the Galaxy AI features that will be part of the device.

articles.title: The LG G5 is the best and brightest OLED TV I've ever laid my eyes on – here's why
articles.summary: LG launched the G5 OLED TV in 2025, featuring a new four-stack OLED panel that significantly improves brightness and HDR performance. The G5 includes the Alpha 11 AI Processor Gen 2 for enhanced picture processing and offers features such as AI Picture Pro and Dynamic Tone Mapping. It supports 4K at 165Hz and has HDMI 2.1 ports, making it suitable for gaming.

articles.title: Samsung announces Galaxy Unpacked 2025 for July: Date, what to expect, and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch its Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Watch 8 series, and potentially the Galaxy Buds Core at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on July 9. The new Galaxy Z Fold7 will feature Samsung's largest foldable display yet at 8.2 inches. Pre-reservations for the foldable phones have already begun in India.

articles.title: How Bill Gates' Daughter Phoebe Gates Used ChatGPT to Grow Her Startup—And How You Can Too
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Phia, a fashion tech startup co-founded by Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni, leverages ChatGPT to optimize video content for marketing purposes. ChatGPT analyzes successful viral videos, identifies key elements such as hooks and patterns, and suggests ways to replicate those elements in Phia's videos, ultimately improving their social media presence and customer engagement.

articles.title: Sparkling Ice packs big Cuties citrus flavor into adorable Lil' cans
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Talking Rain Beverage Company's Sparkling Ice has partnered with Sun Pacific's Cuties to launch two new limited-edition flavors: Mandarin and Orange Cream. The new flavors are available in mini cans and will be sold nationwide starting in July. Sparkling Ice and Cuties are also partnering with Kids In Need Foundation to donate school supplies to under-resourced schools.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy Z foldable smartphones at Unpacked in US on 9 July
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the latest Galaxy Z series smartphones at its Galaxy Unpacked event in New York on July 9th. The new smartphones feature advanced AI and an ultra-slim foldable design.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil Galaxy Z smartphones at Unpacked in US on 9 July
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil its latest Galaxy Z series smartphones at the Galaxy Unpacked event in New York on July 9th. The new smartphones feature advanced AI and an ultra-slim foldable design.

articles.title: Changhong Unveils Smart Living Innovations at 2025 Jakarta Expo, Bringing AI-Driven Appliances to Indonesian Homes
articles.summary: Changhong is showcasing its AI-driven smart home appliances at the 2025 Jakarta International Expo. The company is offering exclusive Shopee deals, including flash auctions and vouchers, to make these innovations accessible to Indonesian families. The product lineup includes televisions, air conditioners, refrigerators, and washing machines.

articles.title: Lawson Opens Future Convenience Store in Tokyo
articles.summary: Lawson Inc. has opened a "future" convenience store in Tokyo, utilizing digital technology from KDDI Corp. This store, located in the Takanawa Gateway City complex and jointly owned by KDDI and Mitsubishi Corp., aims to offer a new shopping experience through AI, robots, and digital signage.

articles.title: Boden shoppers floored by 'flattering' sale dress that 'fits like a dream'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Boden offers the Nicola Jersey Tea Dress for a discounted price of £68.60-£78.40 and Alberta Footbed Sandals for £120-£129. Crew Clothing Company sells the Lola Short Sleeve Tea Dress for £39-£47.40, and Superdry features the Printed Button-up Short Sleeve Midi Tea Dress for £49.99.

articles.title: LG Electronics to Supply LG Signature Laundry Appliances to U.S. Retailer Lowe's
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching its LG Signature 29-inch washing machines and dryers at Lowe's in the US. These premium appliances feature increased capacity, AI-driven washing and drying patterns using AI Core Tech, and smart home integration through the LG ThinQ platform. The launch aims to strengthen LG's position in the North American laundry appliance market.

articles.title: Adguard Mail secure email review
articles.author: Mike Jennings
articles.summary: AdGuard is introducing a new service called AdGuard Mail, currently in beta, offering email aliases and temporary email addresses for enhanced security. Currently it's free, and AdGuard plans to introduce paid features and customization options in the future.

articles.title: Samsung to launch its next generation of foldable phones on July 9
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung announced the Galaxy Unpacked event for July 2025, where it will launch its seventh generation of foldable phones, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 Ultra, Galaxy Z Fold 7, and Galaxy Z Flip 7. These phones are expected to run the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and feature a new AI-powered interface. The launch event will be held in Brooklyn, New York, on July 9 and is expected to launch on July 10 in India.

articles.title: Pinkfong and LG Enter Global TV Commerce Market
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: The Pinkfong Company partnered with LG Electronics to launch the 'Pinkfong Brand Store' on 'ShopTime', LG Smart TV's platform, marking the first venture by a domestic content company. The Pinkfong Company has also launched its premium kids membership 'Pinkfong Plus' on ShopTime, providing access to Pinkfong educational play apps.

articles.title: Samsung To Unveil New Foldable Smartphones On July 9
articles.author: Dc Correspondent
articles.summary: Samsung plans to introduce new foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7, and other Galaxy devices like the Galaxy Watch 8, at its launch event on July 9 in Brooklyn, New York. The company will also highlight its Galaxy AI suite of software features. The Fold 7 will feature a thinner design and slimmer bezels.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 India launch set for July 8 – Expected specs and pricing revealed
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 in India on July 8. The Nord 5 is expected to feature a 6.83-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor, and a 6,700mAh battery with 80W fast charging, with an estimated price around Rs 30,000.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy Unpacked July 2025: Samsung To Unveil New Galaxy Z Series Smartphones in US on July 9th
articles.summary: The company is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. These new foldable models will feature larger screens, enhanced cameras, and upgraded AI capabilities.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Featuring Advanced AI, Ultra-Slim Design Expected To Be Unveiled at Samsung Galaxy Unpacked Event Set on July 9, 2025
articles.author: IANS
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the latest Galaxy Z series smartphones, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, at the Galaxy Unpacked event in New York next month. The new smartphones will feature advanced AI and an ultra-slim foldable design and a new AI-powered interface.

articles.title: Samsung to launch new folding phones on July 9
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to launch new products, including the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7.

articles.title: AI, Robots Implemented at New Lawson Convenience Store in Tokyo; System Could Be Expanded Nationwide in Future
articles.author: The Yomiuri Shimbun
articles.summary: Lawson Inc. has launched a new convenience store in Tokyo featuring AI-driven customer behavior analysis for product recommendations and cooking robots to address labor shortages. The store utilizes KDDI Corp.'s digital technology and incorporates digital signs, cameras, and self-checkout avatars to enhance the customer experience. The store also includes robots to assist with moving beverages and an automatic cooking robot for preparing fried products.

articles.title: WhatsitAI Surpasses 50K Users Identifying, Valuing & Listing items for Sale
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: WhatsitAI, an AI-powered mobile app, was launched to help users instantly identify and value secondhand items. The app allows users to snap a photo of an item to see what it is, what it's worth, and where similar items are being sold online. The base version of WhatsitAI is free, with more scans and features available with subscription.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: When, how to watch the event live and what to expect
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its newest foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, at the Galaxy Unpacked event in July 2025. Other expected introductions include the Galaxy Watch 8 series and the Galaxy Buds Core, with potential announcements regarding a Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE and updates on the Project Moohan mixed reality headset.

articles.title: 7 of the best dry shampoo products in Australia
articles.author: Alix Nicholson
articles.summary: TYPEBEA has launched a 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo that absorbs oil and hydrates the scalp. Batiste offers a Medium & Brunette Dry Shampoo with brown pigment for brunettes. Klorane provides Dry Shampoo with Nettle designed to control oil for up to 48 hours.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold slated for major design and durability upgrade- Details
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Google is expected to launch the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a new generation foldable phone, in August 2025. The Pixel 10 Pro Fold will likely feature a new slimmer hinge, a 6.4-inch cover display, an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, and the Tensor G5 chip for enhanced performance.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event date is out: Expected to launch ultra-thin, ultra-smart, and possibly Ultra-branded foldables
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its next-generation Galaxy devices at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event in July, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Watch 8 series, and Galaxy Buds Core. The event may also feature a glimpse at the Project Moohan XR headset and possibly the Galaxy Z Flip FE. These new devices will showcase Samsung's craftsmanship and support the Galaxy AI suite of features.

articles.title: Google Search AI Mode now available in India: Here's how to try it
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is launching its AI Mode feature in Google Search in India after initial testing in the United States. This feature, accessible via Google Labs and a dedicated AI Mode tab, allows users to perform more complex searches using text, voice, or images, leveraging a custom version of Gemini 2.5. It also allows users to access Lens feature for AI Mode.

articles.title: Bloom Announces Early 2026 UK Launch, Expanding into Europe with New Garden Pharma as Exclusive Manufacturer
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Bloom Brand will launch its Classic and Live vape collections in the UK through a partnership with New Garden Pharma. This international debut is scheduled for Q1 2026.

articles.title: Cattle Australia calls for beef cattle levy review as Meat and Livestock Australia reserves hit $54.3m
articles.summary: New Holland is highlighting the T8's performance.

articles.title: Yale Smart Lock for Google Home Now Available
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Yale has launched the Yale Smart Lock with Matter, designed for Google Home. This next-generation smart lock features Matter over Thread technology for seamless integration with Google Home. It is available for purchase in the United States at ShopYaleHome.com, Amazon, and select retailers for $189.99.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new Galaxy Z foldables with AI-powered interface at New York event
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung will host its Galaxy Unpacked event in New York on July 9 to unveil the latest Galaxy Z series smartphones, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7. These new foldables will feature cutting-edge AI, larger displays, upgraded cameras, and an ultra-slim design. The devices are reimagined around a new AI-powered interface.

articles.title: Supermodel Tyra Banks shows off her unique style in harem pants as she samples ice cream flavours at her new Sydney store
articles.author: MEGAN WATTS
articles.summary: Tyra Banks has launched her first SMiZE & DREAM ice cream store in Sydney, Australia. Her favorite flavor, 'Tyra's Favourite,' features salted sweet cream with butter-roasted pecans and a thick, savoury caramel butter swirl. The store's location in Darling Harbour was chosen because of its relaxed charm and community energy.

articles.title: Qucoon Becomes One of The First African Companies to Attain AWS Generative AI Services Competency
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: Qucoon, a Nigerian cloud and AI consulting firm, achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Generative AI Services Competency. To make generative AI accessible, Qucoon is hosting a flagship event tailored for small and medium-sized enterprises: GenAI for Startups&SMBs on July 24, 2025.

articles.title: Samsung 'Galaxy Unpacked' Event To Kick Off On July 9: All You Want To Know
articles.author: Reema Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung will unveil the new foldable Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, 2025. The company is offering a pre-reserve program for the next Samsung Galaxy devices, providing benefits such as an e-Store voucher worth up to Rs 5999.

articles.title: Samsung Announces 'Summer Galaxy Unpacked' Event On July 9, New 'AI-Centric' Foldable Phones Expected
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Samsung will hold the Galaxy Unpacked event in New York on July 9 to unveil the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7. These new phones will feature an AI-powered interface, representing the latest in Samsung's technological advancements. The event will be livestreamed on Samsung.com, Samsung Newsroom, and YouTube.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked July 2025: Official date, time and key expectations REVEALED
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Samsung will launch the Galaxy Z Fold7 Ultra at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, 2025, in Brooklyn, New York. The new foldable device is expected to be thinner, lighter, and more robust than previous generations. Samsung may also introduce new Galaxy Watch models, Galaxy Buds, and AI-powered improvements at the event.

articles.title: Canal+ Non-Skippable CTV Ads
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Canal+ Brand Solutions has launched a new advertising format consisting of 30-second non-skippable ads on YouTube's Connected TV (CTV) platform. This new format is available across several of Canal+'s YouTube channels, including Canal+, Canal+ Sport, Canal+ Kids, Tv click, and Bagel studio to showcase their messages without viewers skipping the advertisement. These ads will be strategically placed within exclusive content and guarantees the entire message is delivered, maximizing brand recall and engagement.

articles.title: Samsung to Unveil New AI-Powered Foldables at Galaxy Unpacked in New York
articles.author: Korea Bizwire
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 smartphones at its Galaxy Unpacked event in New York on July 9th. The new smartphones feature advanced AI, an ultra-slim foldable design, larger screens, enhanced cameras, and an AI-powered interface.

articles.title: Mattel & OpenAI: AI-Powered Toy Design
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Mattel launched Mattel Brick Shop™ in collaboration with Hot Wheels® in May 2025. Mattel is also developing an AI-powered Barbie doll through a strategic collaboration with OpenAI to enhance interactivity and engagement.

articles.title: Samsung to launch next-gen foldables on July 9: What to expect
articles.summary: Samsung will host an Unpacked event on July 9th to launch new foldable phones, potentially including an "Ultra" model with advanced AI. Leaked information suggests that the Z Flip 7 may feature an edge-to-edge cover screen, and the Z Fold 7 could have a thinner design. Samsung is offering $50 credit for pre-orders to be used on accessories.

articles.title: New Look's £37.49 flattering summer dress shoppers say is 'gorgeous'
articles.author: Laura Fidler Reporter
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its Cream Chiffon Rose Print Ruffle Cut Out Midi Dress, highlighting its suitability for various summer events. The dress, currently on sale, is described as a flattering wardrobe staple with lightweight chiffon material, ideal for weddings or special occasions. Nobody's Child also offers a floral alternative, the Genevieve Midi Dress, in various patterns.

articles.title: LG Electronics is going to strengthen its leadership in the U.S. laundry appliance market by introdu..
articles.author: A Broadcasting Fan
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its ultra-premium "LG Signature" washing machines and dryers in the U.S., starting with a launch at Lowe's. The new lineup features increased capacity, AI-powered washing and drying, a refined design, and smart home integration via LG ThinQ. The products have a new design and are available in silver and essence black colors.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 launch confirmed for July 9
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung has announced its July Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9 in New York, where they will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, featuring potential design upgrades and new Galaxy AI features. The event will also likely introduce the Galaxy Watch 8 series with new health monitoring features, and the One UI 8 based on Android 16.

articles.title: "삼성 엑시노스, Z플립7 탑재될듯"…모바일칩 정체기 끊을까
articles.author: 뉴시스
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will hold Galaxy Unpacked July 2025, dubbed 'The Ultra Experience Is Ready To Unfold'. This event suggests the introduction of a new Galaxy product or service.

articles.title: 28 Beauty Products With Results So Magical They Might As Well Be Magic Potions
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article showcases various beauty and personal care products, including a tightening cream, hydrating eye stick, eye cream from CeraVe, snail mucin essence, dark spot corrector soap, dry shampoo powder from L'Oréal, teeth-whitening pen, Skin1004's zombie masks, exfoliating body scrub, nail and cuticle care oil, collagen-coating hair mask, BHA exfoliant, piercing solution, lip-plumping gloss, Huestick, Mighty Patch pimple patches, nose pore patches, Bio-Oil, anti-dandruff shampoo, glycolic acid peel, lip balm, air-dry leave-in cream, eyebrow gel from E.l.f., putty primer, tattoo aftercare salve and SOS facial spray. These products target various skincare and haircare concerns.

articles.title: Lemnisk Unveils Industry-First Innovations for the AI Era of Customer Engagement
articles.summary: Lemnisk introduced new AI-driven features to its Customer Data Platform (CDP). The features include Real-Time Predictive Scoring, Entity-Level Identity Resolution, Voice-to-CDP processing, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) compliance. These updates aim to enhance real-time, personalized customer engagement.

articles.title: Reserve Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 & Fold 7 Now
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has announced an Unpacked event for July 9, 2025, where they are expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7. Early reservation provides benefits such as a $50 Samsung credit, up to $1,150 in savings, and a chance to win $5,000 in credit. Leaked features of Galaxy Z Fold 7 include improved AI tools and hardware.

articles.title: Use AI tools to make your hustle easier
articles.author: Webmaster Nbsp
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of AI tools like ChatGPT, Canva Magic Studio, Gamma, and Microsoft Copilot. It details how these tools can assist small businesses with tasks such as email drafting, label design, and presentation creation, aiming to improve efficiency and productivity, suggesting new service capabilities.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked 7月见：令人期待的Ultra体验即将在折叠屏展开
articles.author: 飞象网
articles.summary: Samsung will launch new Galaxy products at a global event in Brooklyn on July 9th. These products will feature AI-powered interactive experiences and innovative hardware designs, integrating Galaxy AI technology with Samsung's design.

articles.title: Samsung drives AI transformation in mobile devices
articles.author: Nellius Irene
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. is planning to launch new foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7, along with its Galaxy AI suite at its Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9. The Galaxy Z Flip 7 will feature a larger and more functional external display, while the Galaxy Z Fold 7 will refine the smartphone-tablet crossover design and address issues like thinness and durability. The Galaxy AI suite is expected to change how consumers interact with their devices through features like photo editing and real-time translation.

articles.title: Amazon invests $40bn in major UK expansion
articles.author: The Times/The Sunday Times
articles.summary: A tech giant is promising to increase the availability of same-day deliveries. This indicates an expansion or update of their existing service.

articles.title: Global innovation centre by Logile opens in Bhubaneswar
articles.author: Hemant Kumar Rout
articles.summary: Logile has opened a new global innovation center focused on developing retail solutions using cloud-native SaaS platforms, including AI-driven supply chain execution, store-level inventory planning, workforce management, and generative AI-powered retail tools. These innovations will utilize NVIDIA GPU architecture to enhance forecasting accuracy and enable smarter retail operations.

articles.title: Bunzl set for stronger revenues after acquisition deals
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Bunzl has acquired Solupack, a Brazilian food packaging business. The acquisition indicates a strategic move by Bunzl within the food packaging sector.

articles.title: Saga in talks with NatWest over personal banking tie-up
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: The over-50s group will launch a savings offering. The offering is the first product under a partnership with NatWest.

articles.title: Google adds Dhs21.8 billion to the UAE economy in 2024
articles.author: Gulf Today
articles.summary: Google launched Google's Economic. This indicates the introduction of a new product or service by Google.

articles.title: Recreate the Taco Truck Experience at Home
articles.summary: Cholula has launched 11 new products of cooking and simmer sauces with authentic Mexican flavor. These new sauces aim to help recreate complex Mexican flavors at home, offering convenience and versatility.

articles.title: Verizon adopts Google's Gemini AI to help customers solve ‘complex' issues
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Verizon is relaunching its My Verizon app with a new AI-powered Verizon Assistant. This assistant aims to streamline the customer service experience by helping consumers manage upgrades, add new lines, address billing inquiries, and access savings opportunities.

articles.title: Lawson, KDDI launch ‘future convenience store' in Tokyo
articles.author: Asahi News
articles.summary: Lawson Inc. and KDDI Corp. have opened RealxTech Lawson, a futuristic concept store, on June 23 in Tokyo's Takanawa Gateway City. This store utilizes artificial intelligence to address labor shortages and create a high-tech experience. KDDI aims to make this next-generation convenience store the national standard.

articles.title: Samsung confirms next major Galaxy announcement and foldable is 'worth the wait'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Samsung teased its upcoming Galaxy Z series foldable phone. The company is touting the new series as the thinnest, lightest, and most advanced foldable yet.

articles.title: Poco F7 5G launched in India with Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 and 7550mAh battery
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Poco has launched the Poco F G in India. The new phone features a Snapdragon s Gen processor and a mAh battery.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil new foldable phones at its July 9 event in New York
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its next foldable device. This launch constitutes a news event about a new product introduction by the company.

articles.title: The world's first range-extending hybrid car with swappable battery packs has landed – here's why ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: A range-extender hybrid vehicle with battery swap compatibility is launching in China. This new product offers customers multiple charging options.
